value.dldescription: Expresses the extra net farm income per year (per 5 tonnes of dry matter fed) relative to the current genetic base that will be passed on to progeny of the cows in the herd.

reliability.dldescription: Reliability measures how much information has contributed to the trait evaluation for the animals.

meta.dldescription: Any metadata for the object.  Most likely to use 'modified'
